system.effect: In a splatter of skin and teeth, the attack removes most of the target's face. The strike might not have slain him, but the target's words are forever slurred as a result of this vicious injury. The target is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss. He is permanently Blinded. Permanently reduce his Fellowship characteristic by 1d10.
